lexUnit.name: cure.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: end (a disease, condition, or problem) by treatment or remedial action; relieve of the symptoms of a disease or condition

sentence.text: The biggest single step I 've had to make in curing myself of addiction is to admit that I am an addict .
